thread.title: 19 Questions I Have For Filipino "Medical" Practices And Beliefs Now That I'm A Adult
thread.title_full: 19 Questions I Have For Filipino "Medical" Practices And Beliefs Now That I'm A Adult

author: Isabelle Laureta
title: 19 Questions I Have For Filipino "Medical" Practices And Beliefs Now That I'm A Adult
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @LQForever1 ID: 10659708 2. And speaking of, what’s the science behind washing my face with my first menstruation to avoid getting pimples View this image › 
carriethemusical.tumblr.com First of all, ew. Second of all, ew. And third of all, E !!!
ID: 10659813 3. Do you know what it feels like to have your period? Yes?? THEN WHY PROHIBIT ME FROM TAKING A BATH WHEN IT’S THE ONLY THING THAT CAN HELP WHEN SOMEONE IS ON THEIR PERIOD View this image › 
Twitter: @RlphTORETTO ID: 10659685 4. Speaking of baths, why slather me with oil before letting me take a shower? Is it like a pre-bath? View this image › 
Cosmo PH / BuzzFeed ID: 10660298 5. Like, what’s with all these rules about taking a bath or a shower?!?! View this image › 
Twitter: @PabebeTaylor / BuzzFeed I just wanna be clean, pls.
ID: 10660582 6. Can you please just let me live and practice proper hygiene??? View this image › 
Twitter: @Balitanghali11 / GMA News TV ID: 10660591 7. You don’t really believe drinking the first rainwater of the month of May will cure my diseases, right? View this image › 
CTS Please?
ID: 10660150 8. And hey, why is it so bad to adore a baby?! View this image › 
Isabelle Laureta / BuzzFeed ID: 10660193 9. And how exactly would wetting a baby’s tummy with my saliva revert whatever horrible effects I’ve caused? View this image › 
littleanimalgifs.tumblr.com I mean, is that ALL it takes? Cool. But, how?
ID: 10660137 10. So all it takes for a fishbone stuck in my throat to go away is for me to find someone who was born in the breech position and have them rub my neck View this image › 
Twitter: @paulodc08 / BuzzFeed Wow, so easy. If only I knew.
ID: 10660205 11. Why won’t you let me go to a doctor when I’m feeling sick? View this image › 
Twitter: @joanmae021 I have a lot of questions on this and let’s start with: Can we please call Patawas with Egg “patawasilog?” No? OK.
ID: 10660250 12. How does sleeping on my books actually improve my memory? Osmosis? View this image › 
Star Cinema ID: 10660802 13. And how many books are we talking? Are these enough? View this image › 
Twitter: @legacycubed ID: 10660791 14. Why, for the love of everything good and pure, would you make me drink Tempra AKA Satan’s blood? View this image › 
muramed.com Ito ‘yung totoong war on drugs.
ID: 10660305 15. And why would you only give me the food that I want when I’m sick and can’t eat anything? View this image › 
ABS CBN / BuzzFeed ID: 10660507 16. How’d you get from tooth fairy to rats replacing our baby teeth? View this image › 
Flickr: troismarteaux / Flickr: madaise / Creative Commons Ang layo eh.
ID: 10660540 17. What does “mahipan ng hangin” really mean and why is it so bad? View this image › 
SBS I mean, wind is nice?
ID: 10660664 18. What exactly is lagnat laki and can we cure it by, I dunno, not growing up? View this image › 
ABS CBN ID: 10660707 19. And finally, what’s in Vicks VapoRub that can cure literally anything? View this image › 
Isabelle Laureta / BuzzFeed Not questioning its powers, but just, like, how??!?
ID: 10660231 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
